ygData.subject: Re: Location of Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: I found a Rune of Proximity on a Borer Beetle in North Karana. I was rather shocked that it would be on a creature that isn t very tough(2 level 12 rangers
ygData.messageBody:
I found a Rune of Proximity on a Borer Beetle in North Karana. I was rather
shocked that it would be on a creature that isn't very tough(2 level 12
rangers took him out).

-----Original Message-----
